website_summaries.verdict: Persil power caps are tough on stains and deliver a subtle yet refreshing scent that is long lasting well after a wash.
pros: Has a fresh scent without being overpowering
Pods are great at getting even deep stains out of clothing
These dissolve reliably in the wash and don’t leave any sticky or soapy residue
Comes in a tub of 62 pods
cons: Comes in smaller quantity than other options

customer_reviews.title: If I could give more than 5 stars, I would. Amazing stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a loyal Tide user pretty much my whole life but, man, did Persil blow it out of the water! It smells great but not overpowering. Very fresh. I have a toddler and it has already saved two outfits I though were goners. Once it was a white shirt covered in acrylic paint. Tide didn't touch the paint. Ran it through on cold with Persil - perfect! Next, the time that really sealed the deal, a shirt was covered in oil - and I do mean covered. One wash with Persil, the stain was completely gone. I tell you, I have found my detergent for life.
customer_reviews.author: Edith K

customer_reviews.title: NEVER THOUGHT ANY DETERGENT WOULD BEAT MY TIDE! OH BOY WAS I WRONG!!!
customer_reviews.text: HANDS DOWN CLEANS THE BEST. THE ORIGINAL SCENT IS EVEN A TREAT TO MY NOSE. I AM BLOWN AWAY! MY SON, THE ATHELETE HAS MANY (IF NOT MOST OF HIS) CLOTHES THAT HE ROUTINELY SWEATS IN AND ON. TIDE CLEANED THEM BUT I ALWAYS HAVE TO USE EXTRA PODS AND THE FEBREZE FOR LAUNDRY TO JUST LESSEN THAT UNMISTAKEABLE SMELL OF HUMAN SWEAT. THIS PERSIL KNOCKS IT OUT COMPLETELY AS WELL AS CLEANS IT COMPLETELY!!! EXTREMELY EXCITED ABOUT THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Queenie J

customer_reviews.title: You WILL notice a difference.  Honest.  You WILL notice a difference.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is absolutely amazing. You will not believe how it will whiten and brighten your clothing. If this sounds like something out of a TV commercial, then you should know I am (a) male, and (b) like most guys, I am not into what my laundry looks like as long as it comes out of the washing machine clean. Try it, you will be impressed, and you WILL notice the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mr_M

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading numerous suggestions from a cleaning page on FB. I bought this for my boyfriend's clothes, as he's a mechanic & comes home covered in grease. These have worked better than any other "laundry pack" I've bought. I also use these to strip & sanitize my laundry on occasion. I make my own cleaners & detergents & add enzymes so my clothes get clean. If you're someone who does this also or someone who doesn't use commercial cleaners, be prepared for this product to take your breath away. It does it every time I open the box. Also, it comes with a "perfume card" you will smell this all throughout your home.
customer_reviews.author: D_Sarono

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered twice now and haven’t had a problem with them arriving damaged. I love the original Persil liquid but use the pods for convenience. Persil has a strong smell which is what I prefer in a detergent. It works especially well for cleaning workout clothes. I haven’t had a problem with these pods not completely dissolving like I have previously had with Kirkland and Gain pods. One warning I have is that sometimes the pods can get tangled inside the fitted sheet of bed sheets and it won’t fully dissolve :(
customer_reviews.author: Hkpink18

customer_reviews.title: I love the smell and the cleaning power
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell and the cleaning power. I only throw one packet in with a large load of laundry unless it is exceptionally soiled or very large, like my comforter. I used to routinely use two. I am very impressed with all of the Persil products I have used. I just wish they were a little cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Jeeper for life!

customer_reviews.title: Hot water, cold water, warm water, clean
customer_reviews.text: I first started using Persil around 3 years ago when it came to the U.S. It was suggested to me by a nice store employee that told me it was the best bang for my buck. They were so right! Persil gets out dirt, stains, smells and has a scent so nice and integral you don't need fabric softener. Sometimes I even skip dryer sheets. Clean well and easily with this product, no need to wash something over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: New York Minute

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, smelly disappointment
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I researched laundry detergent brands on Consumer Reports to see if there was much difference between the brands and prices. Persil was their recommended brand. I’m hopeful the liquid detergent is better, because the pods were a disaster for us: the laundry consistently came out smelling HORRIBLE, like some sort of chemical-moldy concoction. I cleaned out our washer, thinking there was no way a detergent could cause these odors...same result after the next load. I tried adding extra pods to the wash which only made the smell worse. Finally, I wised up, gave up, and threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: ACW

customer_reviews.title: ... user until I saw this product with all the amazing reviews, so I decided to give it a ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a loyal Tide user until I saw this product with all the amazing reviews, so I decided to give it a try. I will not be going back to Tide. This detergent got very old stains out of all three of my dogs' blankets that Tide was never able to get out. All three dogs love their clean blankets, and I love that all my clothes look brighter, cleaner, and newer. I wish I knew about this laundry detergent when I worked at a doggy daycare. Talk about stains!
customer_reviews.author: HobbsGal

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for front loaders
customer_reviews.text: If you plan on using these in a front load washer there is a very good chance it will stick to your clothes but you won't know that until they come out of the dryer. You will find a big lump of goo stuck on and the only way I could get it off was soak the affected area in hot water and scrape it off to save the garment. It's happened twice. So now I must cut the pods open and squeeze the liquid into the dispenser tray, I really didn't want to just throw them out, although I did consider it.
customer_reviews.author: James G Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: EHH...
customer_reviews.text: It does its job and cleans the dirt off my clothes.. but I suppose i'm just use to the Tide Pod smell. Something about the scent that isnt all that appealing to me.. i got the samples from an amazon treasure truck giveaway and when i logged into amazon these popped up on the front screen at a discount.. ill likely be going back to Tide Pods and bay a lil bit more for after this is used up.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A

customer_reviews.title: Pods don't dissolve and leave residue.
customer_reviews.text: I love Persil but hate these Power-Caps. They don't dissolve properly so it leaves this goo on your laundry. It's not too hard to remove, but you have to soak it and peel it off. I've used the pods from Tide & Gain without this issue. It took me a long time to actually go through the 2 boxes because I'd have to dissolve the pods in a big cup of water before I used it so I'd end up picking another detergent most of the time. I'm finally almost out and have purchased the liquid which is much better! It's actually the best laundry detergent I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: They don't always dissolve, creating a nuisance!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought the Persil ProClean Power-Caps three times as of this writing. They had usually performed fairly well but in the past few months I've noticed times that the caps don't totally dissolve and have left a hard gelatinous 'plug' adhered to some of my clothes, which I did not like at all. There's been nothing different about the way I do laundry. After trying to reclean a couple of times, the only thing that worked was soaking the articles in very hot water to soften the glop and then brushing it off. Never had that happen with other products and these are 'supposed' to be among the best. Not sure whether I'll buy them again or not.
customer_reviews.author: PBoccia

customer_reviews.title: My favorite laundry detergent!  Read!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite laundry detergent! I decided to switch to this detergent because of the reviews & the science behind it. It works really well. This is my detergent now. I’m sold. I’ve been doing laundry for about 50 years so I’ve tried a lot of detergents over the years. This does what it’s supposed to do for your laundry. I use this for every load I do. Doesn’t fade my colors out & is so easy to use. Just pop a tablet into the wash. I don’t even have to add any bleaches. Try this! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: McSusie

customer_reviews.title: Bleach spots one dark clothing
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure but I’ve use this product a few times because I wanted to make sure I was doing everything right. I have found bleached out stains on my black clothes I have been careful to place the plug pod at the bottom of the washer away from clothes before starting the washer a first I thought it was me but then after three boxes of this I’m still getting that problem no matter how careful I am the next set of pods I order will not be from this company I will try a different
customer_reviews.author: Patricia E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can get it in America now
customer_reviews.text: Growing up in England my mum only used Persil. I love that I can get it in America now. Works well and reminds me of my childhood
customer_reviews.author: Dix

customer_reviews.title: Careful when using
customer_reviews.text: I received my most recent order on May 9th Several of the power caps are stuck together Trying to get them apart, they all burst open The detergent went all over my hands causing extreme irritation
customer_reviews.author: Charlene M.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Best laundry soap I've ever used. Some might think it is more expensive than the jug stuff but since it is nicely encapsulated you don't have to figure out how much is the right amount to use. I was forever just pouring jug stuff in and am sure I was just wasting money. Won't go back to the jug stuff ever.
customer_reviews.author: LeiLani Graham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, best thing ever. Love the idea of pods, Persil really fights stains and leaves clothes smelling Fresh! Finally I won’t be just pouring my liquid detergent and never actually getting whatever loads it says on continue. The pods are cost efficient, amazing on clothes and the storage it awesome too. Definitely will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Ash G

customer_reviews.title: So Convenient!!!
customer_reviews.text: We currently use the Persil Liquid and love the cleaning power. Saw these and though, that makes it easy. Package arrived intact, no broken pods.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pepitone

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, strong pleasant scent, prefer to tide pods
customer_reviews.text: I am a college student and this deal is SOO good. The pack can last for about 10-12 weeks and I use atleast two pods in every use. The pods are also bigger than the tide pods and gets out almost all stains (I use this with a stain remover). The smell is pleasent but I already wear perfume and am scared of scents clashing so I add distilled viniger to the load and that takes makes sure my clothes don't smell of the detergent. Love the smell on the sheets though!!
customer_reviews.author: Appurva

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Works well in any temperature or type of water (I have well water), great for HE, clothes/laundry feel & smell clean.
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: Our clothes smell so good since we switched to Persil!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! I was buying the Tide brand for his work clothes, and I always felt that they didn’t smell fresh. I switched him to these and HE immediately priced the difference! We LOVE the Persil brand, in both pod and liquid form. This is our new detergent of choice!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Works great for dorm
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a year when I was forming in college. Works very well for that purpose since it's pretty awkward, I feel, to walk around with a giant thing of laundry detergent around campus. While this you can just stick one or two in the pocket and head to the laundry room. Nice buy
customer_reviews.author: Nick759

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but good to have for finer washables.
customer_reviews.text: Mrs. G. here. Persil beat all others tested by Consumer Reports. It does get things clean and bright. I gave it 4 out of 5 because it's pricey. I do keep it on hand for my finer washables.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Gamache

customer_reviews.title: Stay clean and smells good
customer_reviews.text: These are great!!!! No more pouring into a cap and bulky bottles, all I have to do is drop one or two capsules into the washer and I'm done. I love how these smell so good and they do get the stains out. I let everything sit in the washer for a bit as a pre soak and all of our clothes comes out great.
customer_reviews.author: SABA

customer_reviews.title: A+ Clean
customer_reviews.text: Love the pods - have used the liquid for several years, clothes are cleaner, doesn’t bother my ‘cheap skin’ ! I keep some liquid in a squeeze bottle to pre-treat stubborn spots.
customer_reviews.author: johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: I first used these as part of a home survey. I was very impressed by the ease of use and the cleaning and deodorizing ability of this product. I have been using ever since.
customer_reviews.author: ereader

customer_reviews.title: I’m Allergic
customer_reviews.text: I must be allergic to it. Made me break out with very bad itchy skin. I really didn’t care for the scent anyway, but that’s my personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent detergent and work well in my front loader. I would switch to this completely except we found one family member is allergic to it. That's a bummer as the wash was never cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: clean laundry
customer_reviews.text: These pods are all I will use to do my laundry. They work great and make your laundry smell good too. The 62 count is a great deal and they make doing laundry a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Lifesaver

customer_reviews.title: Great for stains and stink
customer_reviews.text: Best, most clean rinsing detergent we’ve EVER used!! Gets out the stains and the gross stink out of my husband’s mowing and work clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best laundry detergent ever made. My clothes smell delicious and are so clean. This is relatively expensive in the stores but a great value on Amazon. I'm so pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SC Garden Gnome

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about these pods. They work great and smell clean. I also like that it doesn’t create too many suds.
customer_reviews.author: modern grammy

customer_reviews.title: Best laundry detergent I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best laundry detergent I have ever used. It far outshines Tide or any other one I used to use. It has a great, light smell, clean. It gets my kitchen dish towels brand new looking when washed.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Welcome to USA
customer_reviews.text: Very good detergent, so glad Henkel is expanding to North America. Hope they bring a version for white cottons, similar to what Miele sells. I am not sure how US-version compares to the original german version, but so far my wife is not complaining and the price is right. We like it much more than Tide or other US detergents.
customer_reviews.author: ALY

customer_reviews.title: Saves lots of money nothing else to add
customer_reviews.text: This is the best laundry detergent I have ever found you do not have to add anything else. It removes all stubborn stains. It even took out some stains that I thought were set in Also I like the pods then no one uses to much and no spills
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Not useable _ pods stick to each other
customer_reviews.text: we have used this product for years and liked a lot the smell - But lately (last 2 shipments) the detergent pods were damaged and stick together - very messy and not useable - we had to throw them out and wasted money
customer_reviews.author: B El

customer_reviews.title: My favorite laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value. My clothes get really clean and it lasts a long time buying this quantity. It's a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hutton

customer_reviews.title: Better than other brands!
customer_reviews.text: I really think these work great. Prefer them over other brands. Cleans the clothes and washer at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: JMMc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stain removal & scent, but difficult to open lid each time.
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent, gets stains out easily. Only downfall is container is hard to open each time.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Not much cheaper than Walmart, and the Dash button is a joke since it only allows you to choose from two different purchasing options, and this quantity is not available. The detergent works great though. We have very sensitive skin and what little fragrance I do get off the clothes does not seem to bother us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells so clean and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Love Persil brand and the post are not as thick as some of the other brands. The thinner coating has helped so my washing machine doesn't get a moldy smell.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Schlumbaum

customer_reviews.title: Peril is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Persil is running a tight race with tide. It is one of my go to when it's on sale. It's usually on sale though. I usually buy tide simply clean or tide with bleach. Persil is very very good. The scent stays on your clothes and is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when I lived in England, & delighted that it's now available here
customer_reviews.author: Mudbugs Unite

customer_reviews.title: Smells awesome
customer_reviews.text: Once you use it you can’t go back to anything else. My linen smells so good for days.
customer_reviews.author: Lida

customer_reviews.title: Love the product hate the availibility
customer_reviews.text: It is getting harder and harder to find this product in the caps.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzlym

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cleaning and a great buy. Not my favorite smell but it is very light after drying so that’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent detergent
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that I tried this brand and I'd have to rank it right up there with Tide. It did a great job and that's a must for my detergent because I do a lot of laundry that is dirty and greasy from a farm work.
customer_reviews.author: momof3dogsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pods dont always dissolve in washet
customer_reviews.text: I like the detergent, but not a great fan of the pods. We have a frontline washer and they don't always dissolve. I like the large liquid, but I can't get it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: No more allergies to soap
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely sensitive to soaps and I can't use any of the soaps hubby likes. I came across this at my local Wal-Mart and tried it. No problems with it and gets our linens clean.
customer_reviews.author: janice

customer_reviews.title: The packets work as good as the liquid
customer_reviews.text: Have used nothing but this detergent since I tried it. The packets work as good as the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: carol mac

customer_reviews.title: Great pods, might not be worth the price???
customer_reviews.text: These worked great, but inevitably I ended up going back to Tide, as it seems to work a bit better for less cost. Was very satisfied with the ability for this product to clean my clothes properly though and would suggest them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: csmith

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: These just aren’t as good as another brand I use. The laundry doesn’t come out as soft, the colors seem slightly faded and they smell like cheap off brand soap. They clean ok and I didn’t have a problem with them dissolving like some other reviewers. These just aren’t for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ashli

customer_reviews.title: Love it but not the package!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a tide user but have been loving persil since I discovered it! Gets all our clothes clean and smells great. I find the package to be hard to open and transfer to an old tide pods container ( and keep on a high shelf out of reach of kids!)
customer_reviews.author: fit momma

customer_reviews.title: Best laundry packs used thus far.
customer_reviews.text: Works great plus only at Amazon. Arrives on time. Helped with our older HE front load washer making clothes cleaner with no smell (after using for a period of time).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Persil - The BEST Laundry Detergent
customer_reviews.text: This is the best laundry detergent, Your clothes are cleaner, brighter and smell so fresh! I love you Persil!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Savastano

customer_reviews.title: Best detergent!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite laundry detergent in a pod, what’s not to like?!?
customer_reviews.author: sarabobera

customer_reviews.title: never really having a favorite. Then a friend had washed a shirt of ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried many products over the years, never really having a favorite. Then a friend had washed a shirt of mine and returned it to me, and I was hooked. This stuff smells awesome on its own, but works well with the unstoppable's line of downy scent booster and fabric softener, a trio made in heaven. As well, you can't beat this price.
customer_reviews.author: brennen p

customer_reviews.title: Have been washing clothes for the better part of 32 years with all different types of ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been washing clothes for the better part of 32 years with all different types of detergent. I have used name brand, natural, eco friendly, home-made, even dawn dish soap. Persil is one of the best, if not the best detergent I have ever used. Smell included.
customer_reviews.author: S. H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These detergent power-caps work well to clean and deodorize and smells so fresh on laundry day!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Good detergent
customer_reviews.text: Love the soap...was a good price...but both my containers were broke open
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: did a great job however not 100%
customer_reviews.text: Overpowering smell, did a great job however not 100%.... some dirt around sleeves on sweatshirt did not come off. Better than other brands though.
customer_reviews.author: Radu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome detergent!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Persil ProClean Power-Caps. For me, they get my laundry cleaner than the leading, more expensive detergents. They also have just the right amount of "fresh laundry" scent to them, I don't want my clothes to smell like a mountain stream or flower shop, just a nice clean scent.
customer_reviews.author: larry39208

customer_reviews.title: Good detergent, minus the container
customer_reviews.text: The detergent works well. The container is impossible to open.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This is undoubtedly the best detergent I have ever used. The power caps are best because it takes so little to do the job. I haven't bought Tide since discovering Persil. Does an AMAZING job!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Not the best clean
customer_reviews.text: Didn't clean as well as I thought. All does better and cheaper. Great smell though.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Smells So Good
customer_reviews.text: My favorite smelling detergent, keep coming back to this brand! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Aewaters

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband isn’t the biggest fan of the scent but I love it. The gel caps are so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Claire T

customer_reviews.title: It even gets old stains out when used with a booster product like Biz or Oxi
customer_reviews.text: Cleans and brightens white clothes without bleach. It even gets old stains out when used with a booster product like Biz or Oxi clean
customer_reviews.author: J from PA

customer_reviews.title: A REALLY GREAT DETERGENT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent! Originally found it only at Walmart. Was so happy to find it on Amazon--and in the power caps. No more lifting heavy containers of liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Gurganus

customer_reviews.title: Love this detergent!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite laundry soap. It cleans very well and is super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great and smells great
customer_reviews.text: The brand I usually use changed their scent to something I can't bear to smell on my clothes. My neighbor told me about Persil and I love it! It cleans well and I love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny98382

customer_reviews.title: Not as great smelling as the liquid form.
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed at the fragrance in these packs. They don't work or smell as nice as the liquid Persil. I absolutely love Persil detergent. I had used Tide all of my life until a friend told me to try Persil. I no longer use tide because Persil detergent works and smells so much better than tide. I will stick with the liquid though!
customer_reviews.author: cared99

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product! Cleans, brightens my clothing plus has a great fresh scent!
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

customer_reviews.title: Packing is too thin, received cracked.
customer_reviews.text: Both packages arrived cracked. I’ve only used them once so far. Seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: T. Everly

customer_reviews.title: since I was use to the liquid Persil detergent but I am overall satisfied with the product and will be ordering it again
customer_reviews.text: I was initially hesitant in order these, since I was use to the liquid Persil detergent but I am overall satisfied with the product and will be ordering it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Okay but had better
customer_reviews.text: Does a decent job but I will try the 2X version next time. This was not quite as good as Tide.
customer_reviews.author: Psych_major

customer_reviews.title: Nice effective product
customer_reviews.text: Cleans great and would use again. Only problem is their too expensive and the perfume card inside is seriously way to strong.
customer_reviews.author: B Town

customer_reviews.title: Shipping cost too high.
customer_reviews.text: Best detergent you can purchase. Make SURE you check the SHIPPING COST.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the Persil liquid detergent so I thought this would ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the Persil liquid detergent so I thought this would be an excellent substitute. It’s not. It works to clean clothes, but it doesn’t work as well as the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Redwing

customer_reviews.title: Pricey and smelly
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but the scent is awful. It is strongly perfumed scent with a medicinal undertone. My husband asked me to stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: Californian turned Texan

customer_reviews.title: Persil ProClean Power-Caps
customer_reviews.text: My favorite laundry detergent. After trying nearly every option I discovered an assessment of Persil. It was rated at the very top. I agree. Have used it for a couple of years and have never had a disapointment.
customer_reviews.author: JLW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have Hard water and this detergent does a good clean with no residue
customer_reviews.author: Samanaokee

customer_reviews.title: Good Laundry Detergent
customer_reviews.text: First time I have used this laundry detergent. Very pleased so far for cleaning power and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: gendot

customer_reviews.title: Good job
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job on all clothes, towels and bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Agates

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with pods
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that the pods would not completely desolve . The plastic outer coating would be found in the rubber seal sometimes 1/2 full of cleaning solution.
customer_reviews.author: robert w. dietz

customer_reviews.title: Not strong or large enough
customer_reviews.text: I love Persil liquid detergent, but these don't have nearly enough soap/power to clean clothes
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: These make my clothes so clean and fresh. Great price!! One thing I don't like is that they don't dissolve all the time.. Then I have to redo my whole wash.
customer_reviews.author: Flauna

customer_reviews.title: as good as other Major Brands
customer_reviews.text: I have a feeling this is an over-rated product. it works very good but nothing different from other major brands.we will use it until is gone
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best laundry detergent available
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best laundry detergent available! Smells great, works great in both liquid and pod form and is just better than Tide or the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product for laundry
customer_reviews.text: Historically a Wisk and Tide user, I'll never go back. Perfect product for laundry..great scent.
customer_reviews.author: R. Braimon

customer_reviews.title: TRY this!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the smell of this and it cleans great! I wish the company would make dryer sheets with this scent.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: but this product whitens better.
customer_reviews.text: I suggest purchasing the liquid. Clothes were a little sticky and had to run clothes thru rinse cycle after washing. Not fond of the smell either, but this product whitens better.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Might Be Better Than TIDE
customer_reviews.text: Shhh... It might be better than TIDE and I love TIDE
customer_reviews.author: V. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the liquid Persil
customer_reviews.text: Cleans OK but not as good as the liquid. Doesn't make your clothes smell as fresh as the liquid detergent.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this laundry detergent. I have learned about it when I lived in Germany, and I'm so glad I can buy it here now. Not only my laundry smells amazing, but it get all the stains out that I had trouble removing with other laundry detergents.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: loved this in the UK, and happy that its available here love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: SUNSHINE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the smell is amazing, and the laundry appears to be very clean. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: WWBabe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product cleans clothes as expected and leaves a pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey B.

product_meta.title: Persil ProClean Power-Caps Laundry Detergent, Original Scent, Tub, 62 Count
product_meta.description: Simplify your laundry tasks with pre-measured Persil ProClean Power-Caps. Great for everyday laundry and to help fight tough stains, this powerful formula delivers a premium clean. Convenient pre-measured detergent capsules combine Pro-Lift Stain Removers plus a Brightness Formula. Simply place a Power-Cap into the washer drum before adding clothing. Power-Caps are great for any washing temperature and all washing machine types, including HE. Includes one tub with 62 Power-Caps, good for 62 regular-sized loads of laundry. Dry your hands before using the Power-Caps, as water dissolves the film. Put the Power-Caps directly into the washer drum before adding clothing. If you have a front loader, make sure to place the Power-Caps directly into the drum and not into the drawer.
feature_bullets: Each pre measured Power Caps detergent capsule combines Pro Lift Stain Removers plus a Brightness Formula for a powerful cleaning combination
Persil Power Caps are formulated to dissolve in all water temperatures and for use with whites or colors
Simplify your laundry routine with easy to use Power Caps for a premium clean
Power Caps have been optimized for great performance in all machine types, including HE
This package contains one tub of 62 Power Caps, enough for 62 loads
